section.para: To create a new Shipping Charge Type, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Shipping Charge Type, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a name to identify the Shipping Charge Type.
Enter a description to identify the Shipping Charge Type.

Select to allow free-form Freight Charges to be added to a Sales Order. If not selected, you are indicating that free-form Freight Charges may not be added to Sales Orders which specify the Shipping Charge Type.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a Shipping Charge Type, returning you to the application desktop.
Creates the Shipping Charge Type and adds it to the master list of Shipping Charge Types.
